description: Gets configuration information about a cross-account attachment.

parameters.name: AttachmentArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the cross-account attachment to describe.

nested_items.name: AttachmentArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cross-account attachment.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the cross-account attachment.

nested_items.name: Principals
nested_items.description: The principals included in the cross-account attachment.

nested_items.name: Resources
nested_items.description: The resources included in the cross-account attachment.

nested_items.name: EndpointId
nested_items.description: The endpoint ID for the endpoint that is specified as a Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_items.name: Cidr
nested_items.description: An IP address range, in CIDR format, that is specified as resource. The address must be provisioned and advertised in Global Accelerator by following the bring your own IP address (BYOIP) process for Global Accelerator.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where a shared endpoint resource is located.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the cross-account attachment was last modified.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the cross-account attachment was created.
